backend/main.mo: Backend canister implementing blob storage, access control, user profiles, and product CRUD with categories and image blobs.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two admin dashboard UI improvements to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Plain text list of frontend file paths with short summaries describing their functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme CSS variables and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring routing, providers, layout, and admin-protected routes.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminRoute: Route guard that checks admin authentication, handles connectivity issues, and redirects when appropriate.
frontend/src/components/admin/ImagePicke: Image picker component that validates, compresses, previews, and outputs ExternalBlob images.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductEdi: Dialog component for creating or editing products with form fields, image picker, and mutation handlers.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductTab: Displays products in a table with edit/delete actions and uses dialogs for editing and confirming deletion.
frontend/src/components/branding/Brandin: Hero section showing brand visuals, tagline, and feature badges with responsive layout.
frontend/src/components/cart/CartProvide: Context provider exposing cart state and actions using the custom useCart hook.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer with branding text and attribution link displayed responsively.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Header with navigation, cart badge, mobile menu, and admin link using cart context and router navigation.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Page layout wrapper that includes header, footer, and main content area.
frontend/src/components/products/Categor: Renders a titled section showing a product grid or an empty message.
Tabs UI for switching between all, food, and grocery product categories.
frontend/src/components/products/Product: Card displaying product image, price, category badge, and actions for adding to cart or ordering via WhatsApp.
Responsive grid that renders a list of products using ProductCard components.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/useAdminSession: Manages admin auth session using react-query, storing tokens in sessionStorage and providing login, logout, and session validation hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/cart/useCart.ts: Implements a cart state with sessionStorage persistence and actions for modifying items, quantities, totals, and clearing the cart.
frontend/src/hooks/products/useProductMu: Defines create, update, and delete product mutations requiring an admin token and invalidating product queries with success/error toasts.
Fetches all product summaries via react-query, using the actor when available.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refetching dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identity loading, and exposing identity state and actions.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base setup and custom CSS variables for light and dark theme color palettes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard for managing products, including listing, adding, and logging out.
Admin login form handling authentication, error display, and redirect on success.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Renders the shopping cart UI with item controls, subtotal display, and navigation to checkout or product browser.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Checkout form page that validates customer info, builds a WhatsApp order URL, submits the order, and clears the cart.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerPanelPage.tsx: Customer-facing product browsing page with category filtering and loading/error states.
frontend/src/pages/ProductListingPage.ts: Displays all products grouped by category with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/types/cart.ts: Type definitions for cart items, cart state, and cart manipulation actions.
frontend/src/utils/adminAuthErrors.ts: Utility to classify and normalize admin auth errors and detect transient connectivity issues.
frontend/src/utils/images.ts: Image validation and compression utilities supporting type checks, size limits, and canvas-based resizing.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings and sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/whatsapp.ts: Provides helper functions to generate WhatsApp order URLs for single products and full cart orders with encoded messages.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom colors, typography, animations, container settings, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Stores the projectâ€™s current state, including requirements, architecture notes, known issues, and existing implemented features.
